runs.comm: Shoaib Akhtar charges in from his exhaustingly long run-up, starts with a short of length ball outside off, Smith mistimes it towards cover, off the bottom of the bat
misfield from Saeed Ajmal, this is amateur stuff, a shortish ball is swung down to fine leg by Smith, should have been stopped at the boundary
well outside off this time, steered towards third man for a single
short of length nad outside off, Bosman looks to crash that beyond point but he is late on the stroke, that was a 150 kmph delivery, through to the keeper
angled into the pads, tucked wide of mid-on for a single, Smith slips and falls as he looks to turn for the second
off the back foot, mistimed towards backward point by Smith
starts with a wide down the leg side, keeper does well to collect that one
back of length ball just outside off, Bosman is a bit early into the stroke, its uppish towards cover but wide of the fielder
angling across the batsman, who stays on the backfoot and pushes the ball towards cover
shortish and wide, carved powerfully towards point where Shahzaib does well to field
short again, Smith doesn't miss out this time, charges down the track and skips away from legstump and smashes it over backward point for four
tapped towards mid-on this time, all along the ground
again Smith tries to make room, Razzaq follows him but can't prevent the runs, Smith whacks it over midwicket for a boundary, just lands inside the rope

Bosman is gone, that was a length ball which could have been smacked anywhere, Bosman smashes it but can't beat the Imran Farhat at cover point, Farhat takes an overhead catch to get Pakistan their first wicket
de Villiers is happy to leave his first delivery, it was a length ball outside off
lovely shot this time, but can't beat the man at point, back of a length and outside off, de Villiers gets forward and drives nicely but a diving Umar stops the ball

slower ball does the trick, Shoaib has two in an over, he's overjoyed, as are the crowd, 129 kmh short delivery, de Villiers looked to swing that one through midwicket, gets a bottom edge onto the stumps, no footwork at all from AB, huge wicket this
a confident punch towards mid-off on his first ball
double-wicket maiden from Shoaib, Duminy didn't get bat on the ball as he looked to turn it towards midwicket, off the pads towards backward point, Shoaib looks satisifed till he sees an overthrow
defended to the off side
outside off, Duminy doesn't get bat on that one
overpitched delivery, Duminy thrashes it towards cover, straight at the fielder
Duminy comes down the track, the ball is on his pads, he can only tap it towards midwicket
the ball follows Smith as he tries to moves away from the stumps, Smith just about gets the ball towards cover
again some turn on offer for Hafeez, Smith gets an edge towards mid-on
Shoaib back for his third over, starts with a shortish ball just outside off, Duminy jumps and cuts that one towards backward point, nicely done by Duminy

short of length and outside off, a streaky boundary for Duminy as he wafts at that one well away from his body, it flies through the vacant second slip area and is too fine for third man to have a chance
huge appeal for caught behind, it jagged in after pitching outside off, Duminy was on his toes and can't get bat on it, brushes his thigh pad through to the keeper
on the pads this time, a leg glance sends the ball towards the fine leg boundary, easy for Duminy
short of length ball heading for middle, Duminy defends cautiously to the off side
another dot ball to end the over, inside-edges onto the pad

Smith is gone, Pakistan are making a match of it here, that's another big blow, Hafeez bowled a superb first over and he's struck on the first ball of his second, and what a stroke that is to get out to? a short ball on middle and Smith was looking to cut that one but his bat came down too late and crashes into the stumps
angled into the pads, tucked to midwicket for a single
Duminy comes down the track, gets to the pitch, and drills it towards mid-on for a single
tossed up a touch, a fullish delivery, driven towards cover
whipped behind square leg for a comfortable single
short ball but Hafeez escapes, Duminy cuts that powerfully but straight at the fielder
length ball angling across the batsman, helped towards third man for a single
past the inside edge, dangerously close to offstump, Duminy wafted at that one but was beaten, a back of length delivery that didn't look to dangerous
short and wide, Duminy stays in the crease and guides the ball towards third man for a single
shortish ball on offstump, defended to the leg side off the back foot
short of length ball just outside off, defended towards point
short ball to end the over, bit of width as well, Ingram stabs that one just behind the point boundary, lovely placement gets him four runs
length ball outside off, driven towards wide long-off for a couple
hurried onto the batsman, who pushes the ball towards the off side

Drama, on the pads, glanced down to short fine leg, Duminy charged down the track, Shoaib fields at short fine and throws to the keeper, Duminy was desperately scrambling back, a direct hit and he was gone but he had time to reach since the throw was a bit wide
this one turns away from the batsman, Ingram stays in the crease and works the ball towards point
waltzes down the track but can't get to the pitch of the ball, still goes through with the attempted big hit, mistimes it, 'Catch it,' cries the bowler but it lands short of long-on
driven crisply towards mid-off, 'Nooo,' shouts the batsman as Duminy ponders a single
short of length and outside off, Ingram looks to cut but the ball flies over the top of his blade
slower ball, 122 kmh, Ingram tries to be cute, looking to guide it to third man but ends up playing inside the line, bounces twice before reaching the keeper, who just about manages to stop that one
much quicker this time, 134kmh, a bouncer as well, it surprises Ingram, who takes his eyes off the ball and offers a weak pull, flies off the top edge but lands safely at midwicket
great over this from Gul, just one run given away so far, Duminy tried to pull that short one but misses
beauty from Duminy to end the over, overpitched from Gul, Duminy steps forward and drives elegantly through extra cover for four, all timing and all along the ground
starts with a ball down the leg side, swept behind square leg
spins sharply away from the batsman who looks to run that behind point but is beaten
superb delivery from Ajmal, this one went straight on, Duminy can't get bat on ball again, the keeper has trouble collecting it
struck on the top of the pad as he looks to tuck it to midwicket
supreme stroke from Duminy after being all at seas for three deliveries in a row, a touch overpitched, Duminy comes down the track and punches it down the ground for four, lovely timing again
worked to midwicket for a single to end the over
starts with a short ball outside off, cracked off the back foot towards sweeper cover
places this one towards point and pinches a quick single
outside off, but he can't beat the fielder at point
gets a boundary this time, to fine leg, it was down the leg side, Duminy paddle sweeps it past short fine
works it towards midwicket this time but can't get a run
nudged behind square leg for a comfortable single
keeps it simple here, driven down the ground for another simple single
gets nicely forward and flicks it towards midwicket, no need to hurry through for that run
beaten as he looks for the cut, that one spun away from him
on the pads, tucked to deep backward square leg
tapped down the ground
gets to the pitch of the ball and thumps it for 6 over the long on boundary
another single on the on side
dabs it away for a single behind point
onto one knee and places it forward of square, 50 partnership
just another single, scoreboard ticking over
a mis-hit, but more to the score
low outside the offstump, swishes and misses
was like watching a replay of the previous ball, perhaps a bit closer to the stumps
drifts on to leg stump, swept around the corner
dances down to make it into a full toss, low scoring over, but not the tightest
short of length outside off, Duminy goes for his favourite  slog across the line, he misses
this time he tries a cute dab towards third man but he doesn't connect again
shortish ball just outside off, this time Duminy connects, guides the ball to third man for a single
Ingram walks across the stumps early, takes the back of length ball from outside off and mows it to deep midwicket
short ball from the bowler, Ingram looks to hook that one but can't connect, Gul has some words of advice for the batsman
slower ball down the leg side, just needed to get bat on that to pick up four runs, he is hit on the pads, and the ball dribbles to the keeper
Duminy comes down the track, Ajmal slips it short, but much too short, Duminy has time to adjust, he taps it to midwicket
Ingram goes for the sweep, against the spin but he connects nicely, just behind square leg for a couple
back of length ball spinning away from the batsman, who looks to cut but misses
fullish ball and outside off, chopped towards deep point

Umar Akmal takes a superb catch at long-on, is there a twist in this game? Duminy came down the track and swung that one towards long-on, it was a flat hit, Akmal had to dive forward to pouch that one, and he managed to collect that one low, well done Umar Akmal
full ball outside off, goes for the sweep and he misses, a stifled appeal from the keeper, not sure for what, umpire isn't bothered
starts with a short of length ball on the pads, tucked towards midwicket
short of length ball, Miller moves away from the stumps and down the track, stabs that one powerfully through cover, not very elegant but effective
comes down the track and guides it towards third man
shortish ball outside off, a bit of width, chopped towards deep point for a single
great timing there from Miller, it was a gift from Razzaq, a full toss on the stumps, no power from Miller as he punches that down the ground and holds the follow-through for the camera
length ball down the leg side, batsman is struck on the pads
way down the leg side, batsman was struck on the pads, but that would have missed even if there had been another set of stumps, Shoaib appeals anyway
short of length ball outside off, absolutely muscled by Ingram for four, not great timing but enough to send the ball past mid-on
shortish ball outside off, looks to steer that towards the off side but misses, the ball goes through to the keeper

Shot! this game is getting over in a hurry, full ball on the pads, Ingram gets on one knee and hammers that slower one over deep square leg, the man in the crowd attempts to take that one but he misses the catch
improvisation from Ingram, short ball outside off, Ingram upper cuts to third man, lands just short of Razzaq there

a hammer blow from Miller takes South Africa level, it was total power as Miller clubbed that in front of deep point, not too far from the fielder, but he had no chance because of the pace on that ball
Gul starts with a very short ball, Ingram looks to steer that one to third man but he is beaten
Ingram cuts it wide of the keeper to get the winning run, South Africa will be pleased their youngsters didn't panic against a strong bowling line-up towards the end
